57828.<voice 01380_00057828><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01380_00057828><start_lip_sync n02221 _normal m00001>咕嘰咕咕～～！！<stop_lip_animation n02221 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 02285_00057833><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>不過很遺憾……

57834.<voice 02365_00057834><start_lip_sync m5:

57835.<voice 02470_00057835><start_lip_sync m5:

57836.<voice 02680_00057836><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02680_00057836><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>像麵包一樣被烤熟的，

57837.<voice 02911_00057837><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02911_00057837><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我不知道妳對我有什麼仇，

57838.<voice 02926_00057838><start_lip_sync m5:
<voice 02926_00057838><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>哎呀，我很想你呢。

57839.<voice 03061_00057839><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03061_00057839><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>妳不但將我的身體分散到四處，

57840.<voice 03156_00057840><start_lip_sync m5:
<voice 03156_00057840><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>哎呀，竟然對自己的罪過隻字不提，

57841.<voice 03297_00057841><start_lip_sync m5: <voice 03297_00057841><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>還真是個身體、器量都很小的男人呢<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57842.<voice 03699_00057842><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03699_00057842><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>……你說……罪過？<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57843.<voice 03989_00057843><start_lip_sync m5:
<voice 03989_00057843><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>都是因為你犯下的罪過，

57844.<voice 04359_00057844><start_lip_sync m5:
<voice 04359_00057844><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>要再來找我喔，桑克朗。

57845.<voice 04660_00057845><start_lip_sync m5:
